Detailed Description

Class for displaying a brick in the Shader Mixer pane.

This class allows bricks to have custom widgets reperesenting them in the Shader Mixer pane. To have a Shader Brick use a custom derived verision of this class override its getOptionsFrameClassName() to return the class name of the derived class. The derived class must have a registered class factory that takes no arguments.

See also:
DzShaderBrick
